sect1.title: Sync
sect1.para: Sync Dialog collects all operations related with remote repository to one dialog. Sync Dialog includes push, pull, fetch, remote update, submodule update, send patch ...

sect2.title: Branch
sect2.para: Local Branch: The source branch which will push\pull to\from other repository.
Remote Branch: The remote branch of the other repository.

sect2.title: Destination
sect2.para: Remote URL: Choose remote repository or input remote repository URL.

sect2.title: Options
sect2.para: Force Force Overwrite Existing Branch(May discard changes)
Autoload putty key Autoload putty key when push or pull
